name: MicrosoftSecurityDevOps
description: Run the Microsoft Security DevOps CLI for static analysis.
helpMarkDown: Runs the [Microsoft Security DevOps CLI](https://aka.ms/msdo-nuget) for security analysis.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: config
inputs.label: Config
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file path to an MSDO configuration file (`*.gdnconfig`).

inputs.name: policy
inputs.label: Policy
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of a well known Microsoft policy. If no configuration is provided, the policy may instruct MSDO what tools to run. Default: microsoft

inputs.name: break
inputs.label: Break
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, will fail this build step if any error level results are found.
